segments.text: This kitchen drawing catches my eye.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Three figures in a domestic setting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Woman at sink, drying a plate attentively.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water sheets down to the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's stepped into the puddle unknowingly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked nearby on the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy climbing stool to cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His reach is impressive, but risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The calm garden outside mocks the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Angry at the potential for accidents.
segments.speaker: PAR
